title: New: SKYWLKR – Like 3 Joints Or So EP
body:
**SKYWLKR** is the man behind [**Danny Brown**](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/10115-new-danny-brown-xxx/ "New: Danny Brown – XXX"), the guy at the back who doesn’t want any attention, but is integral to the whole thing. His work on last year’s _XXX_, namely ‘_Die Like A Rockstar_’ and ’_30_′, was rooted in Detroit’s industrial, electronic history, while also exploring the grotesque and woozy sounds of something more like **D-12**.  Following the release of _Impressions_ mixtape earlier this year, **SKYWLKR** has dropped 3 more instrumentals, this time from **Danny Brown** _and_ **Childish Gambino** cuts. It becomes in interesting insight into how he views hip-hop.

Stream the whole thing below.
